casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Steven Wayne HIGHTOWER. No. 84P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of February 2008 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
